alert.note: Alert for La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 02 at 2:13PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Otero, northeastern Huerfano, north central Las Animas and southeastern Pueblo Counties through 245 PM MDT... At 212 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles northwest of Delhi, or 39 miles south of Pueblo Airport, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Otero, northeastern Huerfano, north central Las Animas and southeastern Pueblo Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
